revision.text: '''Hondew''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with exactly 15 points of spicy, dry and bitter and 0 points of all other flavours. The [[Figy]], [[Wiki]] and [[Aguav]] berries must be unlocked to obtain this berry.
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
